snippet: William Baer, a lawyer at Arnold & Porter in Washington, would replace Sharis Pozen, the acting assistant attorney general for antitrust, who is expected to step down at the end of April.
abstract: William Baer, a lawyer at Arnold & Porter in Washington, would replace Sharis Pozen, the acting assistant attorney general for antitrust, who is expected to step down at the end of April.

headline.main: White House Nominates Baer to Lead Antitrust Division
